Title: Git and Github Tutorial - Part 4
Description: Hi, Today in iThePro we will learn how to use Git and how to use with Github to build software and develop it. In this part we will see the git concepts and architecture. - See more at: http://www.ithepro.com/2015/07/git-and-github-tutorial-part-4.html#sthash.VsXMEi5q.dpuf
